#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#define digits 5
#define FOR(i,m,n) for(i=m;i<n;i++)

using namespace std;

int num[digits+5],base,length;

void get_digits_base(long int number)
{
    int i;i=base=0;

    while(number)
    {
        num[i]=number%10;
        number/=10;
        if(base<num[i]) base=num[i];
        i++;
    }
    base++;

    length=i;
}

long int convert_num()
{
    long int i,res=0,power;
    power=1;
    FOR(i,0,length)
    {
        res+=power*num[i];
        power*=base;
    }
    return res;
}

int main()
{
    int i,t;
    long int a,b,sum;

    scanf("%i",&t);

    FOR(i,0,t)
    {
        scanf("%ld%ld",&a,&b);
        get_digits_base(a);
        a=convert_num();
        get_digits_base(b);
        b=convert_num();
        sum=a+b;
        printf("%ld\n",sum);
    }

    return 0;
}
